Text.Value: Oh, yes! The cleric said something about Ethel and, uh, death. It's in a safe in the back.

EditorData.NodeContext: frusttrated he can't remember the details, speaking quickly

Text.Value: Kled must get rid of it, but the cleric said it was a hag's 'deepest secret'. But what if the hag finds Kled with it? Oh, no, no.

EditorData.NodeContext: scared and panicked

Text.Value: You and Mayrina sound close.
The dragonborn was a redcap! Kled hates redcaps. What if - what if more come?

EditorData.NodeContext: has a phobia of redcaps. Terrified and panicked (the dragon born, his friend, just revealed himself to be working for ethel)

Text.Value: The hag is dead, isn't she? Tell Kled the truth.

EditorData.NodeContext: calmer and more at peacer than we've ever seen kled

Text.Value: Leave.
Kled can't believe you killed THE Auntie Ethel. You're amazing.

EditorData.NodeContext: overcome by awe

Text.Value: Hope - it is in Kled's heart. It feels warm and gentle.

EditorData.NodeContext: maybe touching his heart with a soft, serene smile

Text.Value: Kled feels strange - light. Happy.

EditorData.NodeContext: calmer and more at peacer than we've ever seen kled

Text.Value: Redcaps hurt Kled a long time ago. When Kled sees them, he thinks of things - bad things.
Then you'll die.
I'm not getting mixed up in this.
Kled only wishes Mayrina could feel it too.

EditorData.NodeContext: sad smile (mayrina is dead)

Text.Value: Really? Then maybe it is only Kled she is sweet to...

EditorData.NodeContext: pleased - he has a crush on mayrina

Text.Value: Calm down - where is the hag?
A hag turned Kled into a rat. Had her redcaps give chase - for hours.

EditorData.NodeContext: horrified, reliving the memory

Text.Value: But if you can't stop the hex, Kled will take care of her. Feeding, shearing, scratching behind her ears - Kled will do his best.

EditorData.NodeContext: he loves mayrina, sheep form or not, and will do anything he can to take care of her

Text.Value: Jatlo is acting strange. Kled hopes he is all right.

EditorData.NodeContext: concerned
EditorData.logicalname: Doll Destroyed - No Jatlo Combat Yet

Text.Value: Mayrina is not fine - not even a little. Fix her - please.

EditorData.NodeContext: desperate for mayrina not to suffer the same fate

Text.Value: Anyone who hurts Lady Mayrina is Kled's enemy. But anyone who helps her is Kled's friend - thank you.
Yes - finally.
Kled doesn't know, but as long as Kled has the book, the hag will keep hunting.

EditorData.NodeContext: scared

Text.Value: Have you seen a doll around here?
He was only pretending to be her friend - it was all a ploy.
Will this help me kill Ethel?
You - you saw the doll too? It was in the next room - staring. But when Kled looked back, it was gone.

EditorData.NodeContext: terrified

Text.Value: I tracked nature's perversion to her lair and slew her. Balance is restored.
It's in a safe in the back. Kled doesn't know what it is, only that it's important.

EditorData.NodeContext: frusttrated he can't remember the details, speaking quickly

Text.Value: Friends only. Lady Mayrina is too pretty and kind for the likes of Kled.

EditorData.NodeContext: absolutely has a crush on mayrina

Text.Value: He mentioned a book. What was he talking about?
Kled won't let any more redcaps hurt Lady Mayrina - promise.

EditorData.NodeContext: sincere, determined

Text.Value: Because for the first time in years, Kled doesn't feel scared.

EditorData.NodeContext: a wonderous smile, he hasn't known such peace in years

Text.Value: Leave.
Any idea how to remove the hex?
Get it away from Kled - please!

EditorData.NodeContext: scared and pleading

Text.Value: Calm down - we will.
Breathe - what was he doing here?
But the hag is angry with us - because of the book!

EditorData.NodeContext: scared and panicked

Text.Value: Is Lady Mayrina all right? Can Kled help? Kled wants Lady Mayrina to be all better.

EditorData.NodeContext: eager and genuine

Text.Value: Wait - the book! This is all because of the book!

EditorData.NodeContext: scared and panicked

Text.Value: Leave.
Thank you - thank you so much. You are Kled's best friend, for the rest of your life - Kled promises!

EditorData.NodeContext: sincere and grateful

Text.Value: The dragonborn was Kled's friend. Why - why would he hurt Lady Mayrina?

EditorData.NodeContext: confused, upset, doesn't quite understand what happened (dragonborn was secretly a redcap and working for the hag)

Text.Value: The redcap can't hurt Kled - it can't hurt Kled.

EditorData.NodeContext: trying desperately to calm down (not working)

Text.Value: Kled helped kill the hag's redcap - she must be so angry. Stop her, please - before she finds Kled!

EditorData.NodeContext: scared and panicked

Text.Value: You're safe now - don't worry.
Redcaps. Rats. Hag.

EditorData.NodeContext: Freaking out, full on anxiety spiral after a fight with a red cap

Text.Value: Slow down - what is this secret?
Then run, hide - Kled doesn't care. Just take the book!

EditorData.NodeContext: scared and panicked

Text.Value: But Lady Maryina was kind to him - to us!
Please help Lady Mayrina. She's nice and kind and sweet to Kled - to, uh, everyone.

EditorData.NodeContext: has a crush on mayrina and is trying (and failing) to hide it

Text.Value: No - no! You don't understand - it watches Kled. Follows Kled! It will kill us all.

EditorData.NodeContext: trying not to panic and kind of failing (he's terrified of everything related to the hag)

Text.Value: No - Kled isn't good at hag magic. Can't help sweet Lady Mayrina.

EditorData.NodeContext: annoyed at himself, he wants to help mayrina desperately and feels useless

Text.Value: No! She is sweet, and kind, and beautiful - oh. You made a joke, yes? Yes - you saved Lady Mayrina, so you are nice.
You think Mayrina is sweet? I found her more sour, to be honest.
She's just a sheep - she'll be fine.
Where else have you seen it?
You need to do a better job protecting Mayrina.
Lady - Lady Maryina. Upstairs. Please - please check. Oh, gods.

EditorData.NodeContext: Freaking out, full on anxiety spiral after a fight with a red cap - pulling out long enough to direct the player and the burrying face in hands and freaking out again

Text.Value: That's right - the book! This is all because of the book!

EditorData.NodeContext: scared and panicked

Text.Value: How did you know?
Lady Mayrina wants to speak to you - hurry, hurry!

EditorData.NodeContext: urgent but not panicked

Text.Value: Make the hag go away. Kled can't take any more redcaps. Can't.

EditorData.NodeContext: terrified

Text.Value: Mayrina can be very annoying.
Must find the doll - must find it.

EditorData.NodeContext: trying not to panic and kind of failing (he's terrified of everything related to the hag)

Text.Value: Before Kled met Lady Mayrina, Kled never left the house. But Lady Mayrina helped him. Kled is braver now, and doesn't leave friends behind - not ever.
Looking, looking, where is the doll?!

EditorData.NodeContext: trying not to panic and kind of failing (he's terrified of everything related to the hag)

Text.Value: Kled is sorry, so sorry! Kled thought the dragonborn was a friend. What if - what if more redcaps come?
The hag - the hag killed sweet Mayrina. Sent the redcap! What does Kled do?!

EditorData.NodeContext: has a phobia of redcaps. Terrified and panicked (the dragon born, his friend, just revealed himself to be working for ethel)

Text.Value: The stairs, the floor, awake, asleep - everywhere.

EditorData.NodeContext: trying not to panic and kind of failing (he's terrified of everything related to the hag)

Text.Value: You should leave while you still can.
But Kled will be brave next time. Thank you, for saving Lady Mayrina.

Synopsis:
Default dialogue for Kled, one of the hag support group players can meet in the Lower city. The hag support group is made up of people who have survived an encouter with a hag, and who have banded together to try to research hags, but also to be there for one another. However, one of their group (the dragonborn), is secretly a redcap and is toying with their minds. The redcap has also, if Mayrina is present, hexed her and turned her into a sheep. If Mayrina isn't present, the redcap has enchanted a doll that is terrifying the group.
This dialogue covers a number of states such as 1) Mayrina is present and has been hexed 2) player cured her 3) player has saved kled and the others from a redcap 4) the hag is dead and kled rewards them (if no other npc is present) 5) if mayrina isn't present, a doll is terrorising them and he's trying to find it
